Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/Loomis
ShortDescription: EB 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Ashland and 76th due to, street blockage near 75th/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Ashland and 76th due to, street blockage near 75th/Loomis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Purple Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Linden. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Purple Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Linden.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
